page.title: 20REFLECTIONS ON CLATFORD
page.content: This piece of work produced by the children of Clatford Primary School attempts to summarise the{LIFE STYLES} of the {VILLAGERS} living in Goodworth Clatford and Wherwell.The work has been produced during the Summer Term of 1985 and has involved a great deal of research and {ENVIRONMENTAL}work in the villages and the surounding countryside.The children from class 5 at the school went on four local { {WALKS}with Mrs.Simmonds,Mr.Horne and the vicar..Michael Tristram.The children wrote down their impressions of the villages and drew sketches of interesting features.Notes and drawings were then used to produce a great deal of interesting information about our "patch" for The Domesday Project.The work has been recorded on our computer,shown to parents at a school Open Day and displayed locally.
